After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.KPIS: Average response time to service requests
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to respond to service requests.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Service Requests / Number of Service Requests

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: The percentage of service requests that are fulfilled.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: (Number of Fulfilled Service Requests / Total Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: The total number of unfulfilled service requests.

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with service request process
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the service request process.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Service Request Process

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.KPIS: Percentage of service requests completed on time
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of service requests completed within the agreed timeframe.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: (Number of Service Requests Completed on Time / Total Number of Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve a service request.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Service Requests / Number of Service Requests

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: Measures how accurately service requests are handled.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Service Requests / Total Number of Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.KPIS: Number of service requests per customer
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.EXPLANATION: Measures the average number of service requests made by each customer.
After Sales+Customer Service+Service Req.FORMULA: Total Number of Service Requests / Total Number of Customers
